response.overview: Two women, one American and one British, swap homes at Christmastime following bad breakups. Each woman finds romance with a local man but realizes that the imminent return home may end the relationship.
response.tagline: It's Christmas Eve and we are going to go celebrate being young and being alive.
response.title: The Holiday

titles.title: El descanso - El amor no se toma vacaciones
